            "order": 1,
            "cType": "general"
        },
        {
            "id": "test01",
            "name": "author",
            "type": "ahjsgdhbqwkjehg",
            "cHeader": "author",
            "description": "author",
            "dType": "string",
            "order": 1,
            "cType": "paper_label"
        },
        {
            "id": "test01",
            "name": "Paper Title",
            "type": "ahjsgdhbqwkjehg",
            "cHeader": "Paper Title",
            "description": "Give me the Paper Title",

            "order": 1,
            "cType": "paper_label"
        },
        {
            "id": "test01",
            "name": "publisher",
            "type": "ahjsgdhbqwkjehg",
            "cHeader": "publisher",
            "description": "give me the pusblisher name",
            "dType": "string",
            "order": 1,
            "cType": "paper_label"
        },
        {
            "id": "test01",
            "name": "paper_summary",

            "cHeader": "paper_summary",
            "description": "give me the paper_summary",

            "order": 1,
            "cType": "paper_label"
        },
        {
            "id": "test01",
            "name": "introduction",

            "cType": "paper_label"
        },
        {
